1: Steadfast protection and advocacy secure peace and justice.
2: Stand up to protect and help others
3: Protection clears the path and assures deliverance now.
4: Clarity, peace, and protection ensure steady, unhindered forward progress.
5: Justice prevails as obstacles scatter before guiding winds.
6: A guiding presence clears the path and ensures steady steps.
7: Innocent people pass safely beyond every hidden trap.
8: All actions return to their doers; justice prevails.
9: I rejoice with my whole being in rescue and wholeness.
10: The poor and needy receive strong protection and justice.
11: Truth prevails and integrity clears the innocent.
12: Goodness protects and enriches the soul
13: Humble fasting and prayer deepen compassion and strengthen my heart.
14: I care for others as family, with deep compassion.
15: Support the afflicted with steadfast compassion and unity.
16: Practice patience and grace in every gathering.
17: Seek protection that preserves life and brings peace.
18: I publicly give thanks and praise among many people.
19: Justice prevails, my integrity stands firm, and honor remains.
20: Speak peace and make honest plans for the peaceful.
21: Truth reveals itself and integrity shines before everyone
22: Watchful, responsive presence speaks and remains close.
23: Justice awakens to champion every rightful cause.
24: Righteous justice vindicates me and upholds my honor
25: Justice prevails and silences empty boasting.
26: Practice humility; honor others, and mutual respect flourishes.
27: Support justice and continually celebrate the prosperity of those who serve.
28: I speak righteousness and offer praise throughout the day.
